svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2026-02-22T08:25:11.544Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/12.6.5 Chrome/80.0.3987.86 Electron/8.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="cHBgiQxk9mhORHk4E4x1" version="12.6.5" type="device"><diagram id="HBX9M-_UgKiMFsbtIJmW" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 598px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Main函数: 硬件初始化、任务注册、中断管理

switch.text: Main函数: 硬件初始化、任务注册、中断管理

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 438px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
应用层 (Application Layer):
双环PID控制、视觉跟随策略、状态机管理、参数存储

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 438px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
中间层 (Middleware):
自定义协同式调度器 (Cooperative Scheduler)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 438px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
板级支持包 (BSP Layer):
TB6612电机驱动、编码器、OpenMV通信、OLED显示、GPS、WiFi、按键

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 438px; height: 1px; padding-top: 430px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
硬件驱动层 (Driver/HAL Layer):
GPIO, TIM (PWM/Encoder/IT), USART (DMA), I2C, FLASH

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 481px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
公共算法库 (Common):
增量/位置式PID算法
运动学解算 (Kinematics)
数据校验 (CRC/CheckSum)

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
